## Reading Data 

```{r read}
library(here)
movies <- read.csv(here("datasets","movie_metadata.csv"))
gmsc_train <- read.csv(here("datasets","gmsc_cs-training.csv"))
```

## Containers

```{r containers}
# sequences
seq(1, 20)
mySeq <- seq(1, 20, by = 3)
str(mySeq)

# vector 
myVec <- c(1,2,3,4,100,58,5568)
myVec
str(myVec)

# character 
myChar <- "hey!"
myChar

vector_char <- c("jon","Peter", "Sam")
vector_char
str(vector_char)

my_vec2 <- c(1, 3, 4, "Sam")

```

## Factors

```{r factors}

birth_month <- c("Dec", "May", "Apr", "Dec")
str(birth_month)

birth_month <- factor(birth_month)
str(birth_month)
table(birth_month)

month_levels <- c("Jan","Feb","Mar","Apr",
                  "May","Jun", "Jul","Aug",
                  "Sep","Oct","Nov", "Dec")
birth_month <- factor(birth_month, 
                      levels = month_levels)
str(birth_month)
unique(birth_month) 
table(birth_month)

```
